EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2016-06-15-Turbofest Chicago.EMAIL-Confirmation Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}'s Pass to Turbofest Chicago | June 15, 2016
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We Can't Wait To See You At Turbofest Chicago OFFSITE | June 15, 2016 <[[http://vmturbo.com/turbofest-chicago]]> {{Lead.First Name:default=}} Thank you for registering to attend Turbofest Chicago! This email confirms your spot to attend this exclusive event at OFFSITE <[[http://chicago.gooffsite.com]]> in Chicago.
{{my.Turbofest Chicago Calendar:default=Save The Date}}
{{Lead.First Name:default=}} {{Lead.Last Name:default=}} {{company.Company Name:default=}} Turbofest Chicago A Day of Cloud & Virtualization Thought Leadership An Evening of Baseball at U.S. Cellular Field The day will begin at 1:00 PM, and a detailed agenda will be available on April 11. If you have any questions, please contact marketing@vmturbo.com <[[mailto:marketing@vmturbo.com]]>.
- The VMTurbo Team
